import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MatDialogRef } from '@angular/material/dialog'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-bill-dialog', templateUrl: './add-bill-dialog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-bill-dialog.component.scss'], }) export class AddBillDialogComponent { bill = { type: 'regular', amount: '', dueDate: '', category: '', }; constructor(public dialogRef: MatDialogRef) {} addBill(): void { this.dialogRef.close(this.bill); } }

Add New Bill

Bill Type Regular Bill Credit Card Personal Loan Amount Due Date Category
